easy.q: I am yellow and bright and I rise in the sky. I wake you up with warm light. What am I?
easy.hint: You see me in the morning.

medium.q: What word starts with a B, ends with a T, and has a lot of water inside it?

hard.q: I am an odd number. Take away a letter and I become even. What number am I?
hard.hint: Remove the middle letter to get a form of even.
